about.hero_description: At CoreMatrix, we are reshaping the way businesses connect with exceptional talent while empowering developers to achieve their full potential. Our mission is clear: to bridge the gap between top-tier Indian developers and Korean companies, fostering mutual growth, innovation, and success.
about.who_we_are_description: We are a team of passionate professionals with a singular focus—delivering impactful solutions for businesses while advancing the careers of skilled developers. With a strong presence in both South Korea and India, we understand the unique needs of our clients and the ambitions of the developers we represent.

stats.korean_companies_trust_details: 50+ Korean companies trust us for their AI and software development needs.
stats.successful_projects_details: 100+ successful projects delivered with precision and efficiency.
stats.developers_network_details: A growing network of 300+ developers ready to transform your business.

about.our_vision_description: We envision a world where businesses can thrive by accessing the best talent without boundaries. For developers, we create opportunities to grow, innovate, and collaborate globally.

cost_efficiency.title: Unmatched Cost Efficiency
cost_efficiency.description: Reduce your development costs by up to 50% while maintaining the highest quality standards.

project_timelines.title: Accelerated Project Timelines
project_timelines.description: With access to skilled teams of over 10 developers, projects are completed up to 3x faster.

customizable_solutions.title: Customizable Solutions
customizable_solutions.description: Whether it’s AI development or general software needs, we match you with the right team tailored to your requirements.

career_growth.title: Career Growth Opportunities
career_growth.description: Begin your journey with paid internships and gain real-world experience working on cutting-edge projects.

global_exposure.title: Global Exposure
global_exposure.description: Collaborate with leading Korean companies and showcase your skills on an international stage.

continuous_support.title: Continuous Support
continuous_support.description: We provide mentorship, resources, and support to help you succeed in every project.

about.our_impact_description: At CoreMatrix, every partnership tells a story of growth and success:

impact_stats.industries_served_details: 40+ industries served, from AI and e-commerce to healthcare and finance.
impact_stats.matching_accuracy_details: 95% accuracy in matching businesses with the right developers.
impact_stats.support_details: 24/7 support, ensuring seamless communication and project management.

ai_innovation.title: Accelerating AI Innovation
ai_innovation.description: A leading Korean AI company partnered with CoreMatrix to build a team of 15 AI developers. The result?
results: Significant cost savings without compromising quality.

young_developers.title: Empowering Young Developers
young_developers.description: Through our internship program, a young graduate from IIT gained hands-on experience working with a top Korean fintech company. Today, they are leading projects and mentoring others.

about.our_commitment_description: We are not just a service provider; we are your partner in success. Our commitment lies in ensuring businesses thrive with the right talent while developers achieve their dreams. Together, we build solutions that matter.

consultation.question: How does the free consultation process work?

step1.title: 1. Understanding Requirements
step1.content: We assess your project goals, technical requirements, and team size.

step2.title: 2. Custom Matching Proposal
step2.content: We recommend developers or teams that match your needs.

note.content: * Consultation takes about 30 minutes and can be conducted online or in person.

matching_speed.question: How quickly can you match developers?
answers: We match optimal developers within 7 days on average.
For urgent projects, we can match available developers within 48 hours.
Developers join the project after final client approval of the match.

pricing.question: How is developer pricing structured?
answers: Internship developers start from $500 per month.
Experienced developer rates are based on skill level and project scope.
Team packages include management personnel for team hiring.
